hooks.command: session=$(tmux display-message -p '#{session_name}' 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown'); tmux_info=$(tmux display-message -p '#{session_name}:#{window_index}.#{pane_index}' 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown'); terminal-notifier -title "Gemini CLI ($session)" -subtitle 'Permission Required' -message "From: $tmux_info" -sender com.apple.Terminal -ignoreDnD

session=$(tmux display-message -p '#{session_name}' 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown'); tmux_info=$(tmux display-message -p '#{session_name}:#{window_index}.#{pane_index}' 2>/dev/null || echo 'unknown'); terminal-notifier -title "Gemini CLI ($session)" -subtitle 'Input Required' -message "From: $tmux_info" -sender com.apple.Terminal -ignoreDnD
